reviewText:
I have followed the career of Co-Director Bobbi Zabel from her award-winning first writings in 1967. This effort is no surprize to those who have known her passion for accuracy, detail and compassion in her projects. Her use of well known celebrities to help children and parents understand that their problems are shared by others is a stroke of genius not repeated elsewhere.
The topic needed this insightful presentation, and all who view it will gain from it.
